notes: Goal: Initialize Expo Application Services (EAS) for native/cloud builds and OTA update readiness.
Do NOT require local Xcode or Android Studio builds—cloud build only unless user opts in.

actions: If eas.json does not exist, run 'npx eas-cli@latest init' and follow prompts (project name, platforms, etc).
Confirm EAS config (eas.json) and update package.json with EAS scripts if not present.
git commit -m 'chore: initialize EAS for build/test'
phases.commit: chore: EAS config and scripts added

actions: Run 'eas build --platform ios --profile preview' (do NOT require Xcode).
If build fails, halt and alert for manual intervention.
phases.commit: test: EAS cloud build preview complete

final.commit: chore: EAS integration and cloud build readiness complete, artifacts organized
notes: EAS config, scripts, and build results confirmed.
Index updated in /tasks/INDEX.md with files and EAS config summary.
No local Xcode or Android Studio build required unless user opts in.
actions: Move this phase's instruction block(s) and any EAS notes/scripts to /tasks/v1.3.1/
